summary: Implements a TF‑IDF based backend for the Annif system that indexes document texts, builds a Gensim similarity model, and returns the most similar subjects for new inputs using sparse normalized TF‑IDF vectors. Includes a file‑backed buffer for storing subject text.
business_intent: Enable automatic subject tagging and classification of documents by measuring similarity to existing indexed subjects, supporting library cataloguing, knowledge organization, and content recommendation workflows.
